courses.course_name: Advanced Composition and Conversation through the Brazilian Short Story
courses.course_desc: This course will help students advance their knowledge of the Portuguese language through the reading, discussion, and analysis of modern and contemporary Brazilian short stories. By reading the works of renowned writers students will be able to expand their vocabulary and develop fluent reading and writing skills. (WI) (MULT) Prerequisite: POR 2320 with a grade of "D" or better.
courses.course_credits:
3 Credit Hours 
3 Lecture Contact Hours 
0 Lab Contact Hours
